Articles.Content: For a mod i'm working on when you start a new game you need to choose some options before you begin. I'd like to pause the game at this point to make sure at least one option is selected so I don't have to check that condition everywhere else in my code. Is it possible to pause the game and how would I do it?

I'm not 100% sure, but I'd check the GameEvent class for a pause/unpause event, or the HighLogic class for a pause game status.

Check the TimeWarp class to see if time is passing or not might "work", but it would be pretty hacky.

D.
